chomp.title: Reinventing Mobile Work
chomp.description: Experiments in creating visuals using JavaScript to draw shapes on the HTML canvas object.

timeKeepr.title: Time Keepr
timeKeepr.description: At my work, we have to keep track of clients and time. I never liked the interface that the official time-tracking program developed, so I made my own program to keep track of time.

adlessWeather.title: Ad-less Weather
adlessWeather.description: In order to learn more and xml and how PHP parses that data, and in order to never have to go on weather.com again, I made a weather forecasting Website.

microwave.title: A Better Microwave Control
microwave.description: In order to learn more and xml and how PHP parses that data, and in order to never have to go on weather.com again, I made a weather forecasting Website.

stateSize.title: State Size Interactive Visualization
stateSize.description: The United States has taken a decenial census since 1780. Well, now you can see how the United States has grown in size.

hexPlay.title: HexPlay Paint App
hexPlay.description: One of my earliest programming endeavors, but still one of my favorites. A great way to pass the time if you're bored at work.

historicalSentate.title: Senate Ideology
historicalSentate.description: Interactive graphic charting the swings of ideology in the US Senate. See the ideological rank of every Senator who has ever served.
